channel:{id}:followed: Sent when a user follows or unfollows a channel. The body will contain an attribute `following` - boolean set to true `true` if the user just followed the channel, `false` if they unfollowed, and user - the [User](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#User) who just followed the channel.
channel:{id}:status: Subscribes to the online status of a channel. You'll get events sent down named `chat:{id}:StartStreaming` and `chat:{id}:StopStreaming`.
channel:{id}:subscribed: Sent when a user subscribes to the channel. The body will contain the [User](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#User) object who just subscribed to the channel.
channel:{id}:update: You'll get an event sent down that matches the slug, containing changes on the [Channel model](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#Channel). The event may not necessarily include the entire channel resource. For example, when a channel goes online, an event with the key online going to true is sent.
team:{id}:deleted: Sent when a [Team](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#Team) is deleted. The body will contain the team's old record.
team:{id}:memberAccepted: Sent when an invitee accepts their team invitation. The body will contain the accepting user's record.
team:{id}:memberInvited: Sent when a member is invited to a team. The body will contain the invited user's record.
team:{id}:memberRemoved: Sent when a team member leaves or invitee rejects their invite. The body will contain the member's [User](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#User) record.
team:{id}:ownerChanged: Sent when a team's ownership changes. The body will contain the new owner's [User](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#User) record.
user:{id}:achievement: Sent when a user achievement earning is updated. The body is simply an [AchievementEarning](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#AchievementEarning) record as returned in the achievement user listing endpoint.
user:{id}:followed: Sent when a user follows or unfollows a channel. The body will contain an attribute `following` - boolean set to true `true` if the user just followed the channel, `false` if they unfollowed, and user - the [User](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#User) who just followed the channel.
user:{id}:notify: Sent when a new user [Notification](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#Notification) is created. Notifications of the same type will always follow the same structure.
user:{id}:subscribed: Sent when the user subscribes to a channel. The body will contain the channel ID that they just subscribed to.
user:{id}:teamAccepted: Sent when a user accepts their invite to a team. The body will contain the [Team](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#Team) record related to the event.
user:{id}:teamInvited: Sent when a user is invited to a team. The body will contain the [Team](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#Team) record related to the event.
user:{id}:teamRemoved: Sent when a user leaves a team or rejects its invite. The body will contain the [Team](http://localhost:8080/rest.html#Team) record related to the event.
